Beverly Bentley }} '''Michael Mailer''' (born 1964) is an American [[film producer]] and director and the oldest son of Beverly Bentley and writer [[Norman Mailer]]. He graduated from [[Harvard]] in 1987.{{citation |title= BOLDFACE NAMES. A Mailer Link |author= James Barron |date= June 27, 2002 |work=[[The New York Times]] |url= https://www.nytimes.com/2002/06/27/nyregion/boldface-names-738948.html?fta=y}} He has produced over 20 films. He has five sisters and three brothers. He is the founder and president of Michael Mailer Films. He married [[Sasha Lazard]] in 2004{{citation |title= A marriage made in Mexico: New Yorkers Sasha Lazard and Michael Mailer take to Tulum for a storybook wedding--with subplots of dress dramas and a customs crisis and, ultimately, a fairy-tale ending.(Life Style) |author= Kristina O'Neill |date= August 1, 2004 |work=[[Harper's Bazaar]]|url= http://www.accessmylibrary.com/coms2/summary_0286-12864654_ITM}} and they have one son, Cyrus.
